EOSMEDIA

EOSMEDIA hopes to realize the utopia of Dan Larimerâ€™s news media through the blockchain technology. It is a decentralized dApp to keep the freedom of the press, and is expected to bring a new era of media world. 75% of the total EMTs, approximately 900 million tokens are distributed via airdrop to EOS token holders.

Airdrop name EOSMEDIA
URL https://eosmedia.io/
Token EMT
Airdrop time June, 2018
